item.title: Report E-2025020034
item.description:
Report E-2025020034

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-07
  • City: TOMAH
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1741 ET, XPO-XTM notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 8 oz of alpet d2 surface sanitizer released from a plastic jug due to a nail in the pallet poking it. The release impacted inside trailer#382-1827. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. Terminal personnel placed the plastic jug in 10-gallon metal drum.
